overview: Sheryl Young has over 20 years experience in finance and business with a special emphasis on private equity and venture capital. She most recently established and raised funds for a Dubai based private equity company. Ms Young was CEO of BTS Holdings, a property/leisure investment company. She is a former general partner and Managing Director of Cross Atlantic Capital Partners (UK), a UK/US venture capital fund with $300 million under management which focused on seed and Series A investments in the TMT sector. She is a former Vice President of JP Morgan Securities on Wall Street focusing on Technology Equity Research, where she successfully took a number of companies public. She has an MBA from the Stern School of Business in New York University.
